name: Lasagna
steps: In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat until beef is browned; drain off fat.
Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, diced tomatoes, salt, basil, oregano, and black pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook lasagna noodles according to package directions; drain.
In a medium bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, and parsley.

Spread 1 cup of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Arrange 3 lasagna noodles on top of sauce. Spread 1/3 of the ricotta cheese mixture over noodles. Sprinkle with 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese and 1/4 cup of the Parmesan cheese. Repeat layers, ending with meat sauce and remaining cheeses.
Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes before serving.
